name: 財務工程與創新
description:
財務工程 ( financial engineering) 是一個包含財務數學 （mathematical finance），數值方法（numerical methods）以及電腦模擬（computer simulations）等的一個跨領域學科。相關知識可以廣泛協助決策者交易、投資、風險管理。隨著金融環境及商品的多元化發展，近年來財務工程領域逐漸興起。本課程將著重各類衍生性商品的定價、避險、風險管理，介紹給學生各類衍生性金融商品、基礎資產價格模型、選擇權評價模型於金融市場與財務風險管理之應用，並建立學生財務工程相關之基礎觀念。
Financial engineering involves the design, the development, and the implementation of innovative financial instruments and process, and the formulation of creative solutions to problems in finance. With the prevailing of Financial Engineering and products diversification, many of the financial engineering-relative products have been seen in the market. This course introduces popular financial derivatives and structured products. It places emphasis on the fundamental theories and methods on pricing, hedging and risk management, along with their implementation in practical applications.
syllabus:
1.  Introduction
2.  Risk and Returns
3.  Methods in Financial Engineering
4.  Monte Carlo Simulation
5.  Index and ETF
6.  Futures Contracts: Hedging and Arbitrage
7.  Brownian Motion and Ito’s Lemma
8.  Options Contracts: Pricing, Trading, Greeks, and Hedging
9.  Arrow Debreu Theory and Options Pricing
10.  Black-Scholes PDE, Feynmen-Kac Theorem and Numerical Methods
11.  Volatility Smile and Volatility Trading
12.  Swaps
13.  Python and Derivative Pricing
14.  Matlab and Derivative Pricing
15.  Foreign Exchange Derivatives
16.  Interest Rate Derivatives
17.  Credit Derivatives
18.  Structured Products
